item.title: Defender Experts Chronicles: A Deep Dive into Storm-0867
item.description: BACKGROUND At Microsoft, we are always on the lookout for advanced and emerging threats that could compromise the security of our customers. This has pushed our Defender Experts for XDR team to constantly stay vigilant, monitoring and responding to incidents with speed and efficiency. In late May 2023 (See Fig. 1), we encountered a surge in cases involving highly sophisticated adversary-in-the-middle (AiTM) attacks.
